title: Gold Bot Duo LF Serious Team for Open Ladder
body:
Hi there,

Both myself and my bot lane duo partner are looking for a serious team to go into the open ladder tournaments to test our skills.

We are both over 20 years old, we have considerable experience playing bot lane together, and take progression and learning very seriously.

My IGN is Drew Carry (support main).
My partners IGN is Bolskies (ADC main).

We also have a lot of experience playing other roles, but would prefer if we could stick together in the bot lane with our existing synergy.

Voice communication etc is no problem, happy to use any software.

Generally we are available for games late at night (10:00pm-2:00am EST) but we are happy to try work our schedules around the teams' requirements.

Please feel free to get in touch either here or through the game ASAP!
